summary: H.R. 304 is a bill introduced in the House of Representatives by Rep. Brian Mast and other Florida representatives. It proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 290 NW Peacock Boulevard in Port St. Lucie, Florida, as the "Trooper Zachary Fink Post Office Building." The bill specifies that any reference to this facility in any official U.S. law, map, document, or other record shall be updated to reflect the new name, thereby honoring Trooper Zachary Fink.
